Class RequestBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.server.RequestBuffer

  • public class RequestBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the buffer between the Key-Value store and the server containing Requests
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade

      • notifyAllThreadsToStopWaiting

        public void notifyAllThreadsToStopWaiting()
        Enables to notify all the threads that are currently waiting for request. This method also make that all waiting-take() calls will return null
